meanings.definition: The act or process of stylizing something.
meanings.sent1: Her unique stylization of the painting made it stand out in the gallery.
meanings.sent2: The artist's stylization of the characters in the comic book was very distinctive.
meanings.sent3: The stylization of the dance routine was so exaggerated that it looked like a cartoon come to life.
meanings.sent4: The designer's bold stylization of the furniture gave the room a futuristic feel.
meanings.sent5: The stylization of the logo made it instantly recognizable to customers.

meanings.sent1: The movie's stylization was praised for its artistic flair.
meanings.sent2: The stylization of the costume added a touch of elegance to the stage production.
meanings.sent3: The cake's stylization was so perfect that it almost looked too good to eat.
meanings.sent4: The stylization of the garden transformed it into a magical wonderland.
meanings.sent5: The stylization of the font made the text easy to read and visually appealing.
